html:
{{t:title}}

{{t:subtitle}}
css: .cover-island-natur-section { position: relative; height: 90vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; color: var(--color-light); text-align: center; overflow: hidden; } .background-image-wrapper { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: -2; } .background-image-wrapper img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .overlay { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.6) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.2) 50%, transparent 100%); z-index: -1; } .container { width: 90%; max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; z-index: 1; } h1 { font-family: serif; font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 6vw, 4rem); margin-bottom: 1.5rem; text-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); } .subtitle { font-size: 1.1rem; max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; opacity: 0.9; } .scroll-indicator { position: absolute; bottom: 2rem; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); animation: bounce 2s infinite; } @keyframes bounce { 0%, 20%, 50%, 80%, 100% { transform: translate(-50%, 0); } 40% { transform: translate(-50%, -10px); } 60% { transform: translate(-50%, -5px); } } .anim-delay-1 { transition-delay: 0.2s; }

de.name: Island Natur
de.title: Island, wie die Natur es gemalt hat
de.subtitle: Hochwertige Inhalte können eine mittelmäßige Seite in ein Kunstwerk verwandeln.

en.name: Iceland Nature
en.title: Iceland, as nature painted it
en.subtitle: High-quality content can turn a mediocre page into a work of art.

ar.name: طبيعة أيسلندا
ar.title: أيسلندا كما رسمتها الطبيعة
ar.subtitle: يمكن للمحتوى عالي الجودة أن يحول صفحة متواضعة إلى عمل فني.
